title: Handle a Supplier Price Increase
description: A supplier announces a 5% price increase on all their products, effective next month.

tasks.description: Receive the price increase notification from the supplier.
Update the cost for all of the supplier's products in the system, effective on the specified date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the price cost update.

tasks.description: Analyze the impact of the cost increase on profit margins.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a report showing the margin impact.

tasks.description: Notify the sales and pricing teams so they can adjust customer pricing accordingly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a notification to the relevant internal teams.
